subject: Re: textui.TestRunner exit codes
msgSnippet: ... The proposed interface is 1 means test error or failure and 2 means some unexpected exception in the testing mechanism itself. Kent
messageBody:
--- In junit@y..., Timothy Wall <twall@o...> wrote:
> Ideally, an error indicates your test needs fixing, while a failure
> means your code under test needs fixing.
>
> T.

The proposed interface is 1 means test error or failure and 2 means
some unexpected exception in the testing mechanism itself.

Kent
